name: He Got Shivved
description:
After a murder occurs during a blackout at a restaurant, you, the Detective, must discover who the killer is by searching for pieces of evidence and speaking to witnesses. Overtime, you're conversations with the people will assist you in determining who the killer is.  Controls

WASD - Movement

Left Shift - Sprint

E - Interact

Credits

Leo Laughlin

Kelly Stragalas
